Headline: Temporary Eastbound #35 35th Reroute near 35th/Rockwell
ShortDescription: Eastbound #35 35th buses are temporarily rerouted near 35th/Rockwell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #35 35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, California, 39th, Western, 35th, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 35th/Rockwell.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
